DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy safety serial FMT induce maintain clinical endoscopic response patient mild moderate Crohn 's disease
DOC.detailed_description: Double blind study randomize patient mild moderate Crohn 's 1:1 ( FMT : water ) stratify disease duration current use biologic therapy . First FMT/placebo week 0 colonoscopy plus weekly FMT/placebo capsule 7 week . At week 8 , repeat colonoscopy do endoscopy score repeat . Responders FMT arm eligible enter open label phase receive FMT capsule q2 week . Blood , stool urine sample , colonic biopsy collect . Quality Life measure Short Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire , EuroQol five dimension , Work Productivity Activity Impairment Questionnaire : Crohns disease dietary intake diary collect . Colonoscopies record reviewed central reader .
